snippet.title: In the heart of the Eternal City
snippet.text: Set between Spanish Steps and Piazza del Popolo, an innovative art boutique hotel that offers free minibar and gourmet breakfast.

snippet.title: The Eternal City's opulent grande dame
snippet.text: A supremely luxurious and iconic residence, blending a noble heritage with fearless elegance and disruptive artistry.
